data science job for the role Fire Alarm Systems Technician

• With a mid-year, and year-end review you'll have two windows each year to progress recognizing the pace at which you could grow.
• Join our Graduate Committee and home in on your planning, networking and co-ordination skills.
• The Solutions Engineering Operations team is looking for an Operations Analyst Recent Graduate who is eager to apply technical and analytical skills in the semiconductor industry.
• A yearly occurrence exclusive for Graduates allowing you to hear from executive members, inspiring speakers and make connections for life.
• A Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
• Basic programming or scripting skills (Python, Bash, or similar) to support automation.
• Experience working with databases or data pipelines.
• Attend our "Grad-teach-Grads" workshops, guest speaker series and various social events to expand your knowledge.
